title: Game Won't Patch
body: So I opened up the league client today and this message "Something is up with our servers and its preventing you from patching.  We're giving it another shot. In the mean time you can check out the status of our servers here. (Error code 003" Does anyone know what this means, because I keep pressing the OKAY button, but it just keeps popping up.

replies.body: That 003 error means your network wasn't able to get a clear signal with our servers for one reason or another. We were having some login and patching issues earlier today, but most players were finally able to get past this after a bit. It does look like you were able to get in and play a few games today, but definitely hit me back up in a reply if you're still having problems!!

Thanks man sorry it took me so long to get back to you. Like an hour or so after I wrote my discussion so saw that there was notification saying that lots of people where having trouble with patching the game. Soon after that my game began to patch and everything was fine. Thanks again for the help. : )
